bill.title: Ghost Guns Are Guns Act
bill.description: Broadens the definition of firearm for purposes of federal firearms laws. Specifically, it includes as a firearm any combination of parts designed or intended to be used to convert a device into a firearm and from which a firearm may be readily assembled.

committee.name: Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security
